item.title: RRGI Founder’s Day was celebrated on the Chairman’s Birthday on 24th September

Continue reading "RRGI Founder’s Day was celebrated on the Chairman’s Birthday on 24th September"
item.content:encoded:
The founder’s day at RajaRajeswari Group of Institutions was celebrated on its beloved chairman’s birthday on 24th September. The event was marked by the students, faculties, dignitaries from different walks of life who graced the occasion and also wished the Chairman sincerely. Blood donation camp, sports winner’s trophy presentation as well as cultural programmes formed part of the celebrations. The Chairman, on this occasion announced that an Old Age Home has been launched at Arni and expressed his desire to continue to contribute towards the society. The function ended with some spectacular cultural programs presented by the students.

Go to Photo Gallery
